ygData.subject: Re: Selo's and SOW experiment and a bit on Koalindl Fish
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... It is possible to get the fish from Frostbite, you don t need to do anything else.  I tried it once as a bard but got nothing except a nice bit
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 16 Sep 1999 07:51:32 -0500, you wrote:

>From: "Donny Dane" <ddane@...>
>
<snips>

>Now for the Koalindl Fish - possible spoilers, so obligatory space
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>*
>Well, two of us rendevoused out in the Barbarian village in West K, and
>found Frostbite. Mcmannus stands just within aggro range at times, so you
>have to watch him, and make sure he leaves. Also, another wandering
>Barbarian walks around near the pen on an irregular basis. After both Barbs
>were clear, I took Frostbite for a bit of a run, to get him away from the
>camp, and proceeded to solo him. Easy fight at 17th level, using
>dirk/barbed whip/songs. But, no fish. Just a ruined wolf pelt. so my
>guildmate shows up, we wait a bit, new spawn, let the barbs run off, and he
>nukes the wolf. Same thing, ruined wolf pelt. So, there is something more
>to getting Frostbite to have a fish on his corpse, or another way to get it
>from him, without killing him.

It is possible to get the fish from Frostbite, you don't need to do
anything else. I tried it once as a bard but got nothing except a
nice bit of xp :-)

As a wizard I killed Frostbite a few times and eventually got the damn
fish.

However, she is now unable to go anywhere near Halas due to the
faction hits you take. Just as well, she hates the cold anyway!!

So you take your choice what way to get the fish. Either no-go in
Qeynos, or no-go in Halas. I might suggest doing it from Qeynos since
there is probably a way to raise your faction with them again. As far
as I can tell, there is no way to raise your faction in Halas, so no
partying with the barbarians as a wizard for me!!!

See yas

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (23), Mith Marr

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (12), Mith Marr
